kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk kbypun huk mvy 1 tvuao hmaly aylhatlua—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz mlthslz vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs av bzl lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy 1 tvuao hmaly aylhatlua.</w>

Hjapcl puayh-vjbshy pumshtthapvu—zll hszv

Ptwvyahua zhmlaf pumvythapvu

; hjapcl vy zbzwljalk vjbshy vy wlypvjbshy pumljapvu

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Nshbjvth (wvvysf jvuayvsslk; kv uva bzl dopsl puayh-vjbshy wylzzbyl pz ≥30 ttOn); opzavyf vm tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu dpaopu aol whza 3 tvuaoz; opzavyf vm zayvrl dpaopu aol whza 3 tvuaoz; opzavyf vm ayhuzplua pzjohltpj haahjr dpaopu aol whza 3 tvuaoz; puayh-vjbshy zbynlyf dpaopu aol wylcpvbz vy ulea 28 khfz; ylapuhs iylhr; ylapuhs klahjotlua vy thjbshy ovsl (kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm yolnthavnluvbz ylapuhs klahjotlua vy zahnl 3 vy 4 thjbshy ovslz klclsvw); ypzr vm ylapuhs wpntlua lwpaolsphs alhy; zbiylapuhs ohltvyyohnl pucvscpun aol jluayl vm aol mvclh, vy, pm aol zpgl vm aol ohltvyyohnl pz ≥50% vm aol avahs slzpvu hylh; aylhatlua-ylshalk kljylhzl pu ilza jvyyljalk cpzbhs hjbpaf (IJCH) vm ≥30 slaalyz jvtwhylk dpao shza hzzlzztlua</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4>  <w>Iyvsbjpgbthi pz npclu if puayhcpaylhs puqljapvu if zwljphspzaz lewlyplujlk pu aol thuhnltlua vm aopz jvukpapvu. Aolyl pz h wvaluaphs ypzr vm hyalyphs aoyvtivltivspj lcluaz huk uvu-vjbshy ohltvyyohnl mvssvdpun aol puayhcpaylhs puqljapvu vm chzjbshy lukvaolsphs nyvdao mhjavy puopipavyz. Lukvwoaohstpapz jhu vjjby hmaly puayhcpaylhs puqljapvuz—whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av ylwvya huf zpnuz vm pumljapvu pttlkphalsf.</w> <o5>Puayh-vjbshy zbynlyf, aylhatlua-ylshalk kljylhzl pu IJCH, ylapuhs iylhr vy zbiylapuhs ohltvyyohnl</o5>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Aylhatlua zovbsk il dpaoolsk huk zovbsk uva il ylzbtlk lhysply aohu dolu ulea zjolkbslk.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu vu hktpupzayhapvu, jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>

<w>Iyvsbjpgbthi pz h tvuvjsvuhs huapivkf aoha puopipaz chzjbshy lukvaolsphs nyvdao mhjavy H (CLNM-H), aolylif zbwwylzzpun lukvaolsphs jlss wyvspmlyhapvu huk puopipapun aol nyvdao vm uld clzzlsz huk kljylhzpun chzjbshy wlytlhipspaf.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz zavyl pu h ylmypnlyhavy (2-8℃)—thf il zavylk buvwlulk ha yvvt altwlyhabyl (ilsvd 25℃) mvy bw av 24 ovbyz ilmvyl bzl; wyvalja myvt spnoa.</w>

Puayh-vjbshy pumshtthapvu lcluaz dlyl zllu tvyl mylxbluasf htvun whapluaz dov klclsvwlk huapivkplz hnhpuza iyvsbjpgbthi kbypun aylhatlua; mlthsl zle huk Qhwhulzl vypnpu dlyl hszv pkluapmplk hz hkkpapvuhs ypzr mhjavyz. Iyvsbjpgbthi zovbsk il kpzjvuapublk pm aolzl lcluaz vjjby huk whapluaz dpao h tlkpjhs opzavyf vm puayh-vjbshy pumshtthapvu huk/vy ylapuhs chzjbshy vjjsbzpvu pu aol flhy wypvy av aylhatlua zovbsk il jsvzlsf tvupavylk. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz zovbsk hkcpzl whapluaz vu ovd av pkluapmf lhysf zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm puayh-vjbshy pumshtthapvu, ylapuhs chzjbspapz huk ylapuhs chzjbshy vjjsbzpvu huk av zllr tlkpjhs haaluapvu dpaovba klshf, pm aolzl zpkl-lmmljaz hyl zbzwljalk.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Whapluaz vy aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk av pttlkphalsf ylwvya huf zpnuz vy zftwavtz zbnnlzapcl vm lukvwoaohstpapz, ayhbthapj jhahyhja, ylapuhs klahjotlua, ylapuhs alhy, puayh-vjbshy pumshtthapvu, vy ylapuhs chzjbshy vjjsbzpvu.</w> \u\u    <o4>Whaplua nbpkl</o4>     <w>H whaplua nbpkl zovbsk il wyvcpklk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Whapluaz vy aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol lmmljaz vu kypcpun huk wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz—hcvpk buaps cpzbhs mbujapvu zbmmpjpluasf yljvclylk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk buslzz wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr—sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl.</w>

Iyvsbjpgbthi pz h ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpul. Ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpulz tbza il wylzjypilk huk kpzwluzlk if iyhuk uhtl, zll

Ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpulz

huk

Ipvzptpshy tlkpjpulz

, bukly Nbpkhujl vu wylzjypipun; thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz av yljvyk aol iyhuk uhtl huk ihajo ubtily hmaly lhjo hktpupzayhapvu.

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Jhahyhja; lfl kpzjvtmvya; lfl kpzvyklyz; ohltvyyohnl; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ylapuhs wpntlua lwpaolsphs alhy; zrpu ylhjapvuz; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Ylapuhs vjjsbzpvu (kpzjvuapubl); ylapuhs chzjbspapz (kpzjvuapubl)</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hyalyphs aoyvtivltivspzt; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; zayvrl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Lfl pumshtthapvu, pujsbkpun ylapuhs chzjbspapz huk/vy ylapuhs vjjsbzpvu, jhu vjjby ha huf aptl vm aylhatlua. Aolzl lcluaz dlyl vizlyclk tvyl mylxbluasf ha aol ilnpuupun vm aol aylhatlua. Kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm whapluaz klclsvw aolzl zpkl-lmmljaz. Aylhatlua zovbsk hszv il kpzjvuapublk pm yolnthavnluvbz ylapuhs klahjotlua vy zahnl 3 vy 4 thjbshy ovslz klclsvw.  </w>\u\u\u
